system.description: The character bounces the burst off one fae and into another
system.effect: The character makes a ranged attack against a target in line of sight. If the attack is a success, it inflicts regular damage. On a Fantastic success, energy also bounces off the first target 10 another in line of sight, and the character can make a new attack against that target, adding the new range to the previous attack's range. This can bo repeated until an attack is not fantastic.
